nodes.text: Allegiant General was a rank in the First Order military that was held by Enric Pryde during the war between the First Order and the Resistance. The rank was equivalent to that of a Grand Marshal, in that the holder commanded both ground and space-based military forces. General Armitage Hux believed that Supreme Leader Kylo Ren had promoted Pryde to allegiant general as a way to mock him, and also believed that all officers and stormtroopers present on the bridge of the Resurgent-class Star Destroyer Steadfast knew it as well.
